price: Na tutawaonjesha adhabu khafifu kabla ya adhabu kubwa, huenda labda watarejea.
arabic: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَدۡنَىٰ دُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: Na tunaapa: Hapana shaka tutawaonjesha duniani adhabu duni kabla hawajaifikia hiyo adhabu kubwa kabisa, nayo ni kudumu milele katika Moto. Huenda pengine watakao adhibiwa kwa hiyo adhabu duni watatubia, waache ukafiri wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walanudhīqannahum mina al-ʿadhābi al-adnā dūna al-ʿadhābi al-akbari laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
translations: And surely, We will let them taste
